title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message:
Got this MacBook Pro Retina 15

It had some minor liquid spill. Some sticky juice. Not very much mostly some sticky stains on top of cooler and RAM. Trackpad also little sticky.

It was not charging the battery so I tried another battery and this charged fine. 

Then I thought I would clean those sticky stains and cleaned it in uc.

Now I have got the chime but no image on either internal or external screen and fans goes slowly up to full speed.

Where do I start with this issue ?

Thanks

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message: Did you let it dry sufficiently before powering it on? Do you get a chime? Was the liquid/residue near the BIOS/clock area?

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message:
Yes I used an oven to dry it as I always do. 

Yes i I got a chime

No liquid around BIOS

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message: Try on SMC bypass.......

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message:
SMC bypass still no image or backlight. 

Same issue but on SMC bypass fans go full throttle right from the beginning (the normal startup starts quiet and fans go faster and faster and ends in full speed after couple of minutes)

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message: GPU Vcore present?

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message: Yes is is  0,9V

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message: Try with known good LCD of the correct year.

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message: Same issue with known good display assembly :-(

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message: PRAM reset also tried of course. Did not mention it in the first post but it was the first thing I tried .

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message: What external screen are you using? Thunderbolt port or HDMI?

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message: I tried both ports. Normal minidisplay interface connected in the thunderbolt port though.

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message:
It is trolling me...

I ran it through uc again. But now I have lost GPU VCORE. GPU gets hot though

Now I have no P3V3GPU_EN 

Symptoms still the same: Chime but no image.

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message: Push on U9300 and power on, see if Vcore comes high when you keep pressure on it.

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message:
Yes it comes om while holding the pressure 

Still no image and loosing GPU VCORE men releasing the pressure

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message: Resolder U9300. Do not pull it, just heat it up a bit and drag your iron along the pins with some fresh solder. This should at least solve GPU Vcore issue.

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message: You're right. GPU VCORE is now back at 0.899 but still no image

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message: I have no idea. What kind of ultrasonic are you using?

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message: Crest with es132 and dem. water

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message: Tested external image now Vcore is back?

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message: Yes already tested. No image om either thunderbolt or HDMI.

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message: SMC_LID high?

title: 820-3787 No image after UC
message:
Yes. SMC_LID 3.4V

Customer needed the computer back urgently so I replaced the logic board. 

This board went to the maybe-fixable pile and I'll update this thread if I ever get back to it.

Thanks Duke as always for the assist.
